content:
I'm trying to use the lean4game template to create a game. I want to introduce the have tactic, but using 

NewTactic have

gives the error "unexpected token 'have'; expected command". I'm currently getting around this by creating a custom wrapper tactic "myHave" that calls have. Is there a way to allow the user to just use the "have" tactic?

I realized that NNG uses the have tactic and figured out that using

NewTactic «have»

works.
Justin Morrill has marked this topic as resolved.
